Description.SourceString: Auto Pop is both a strategic option, and an easy way to reduce the number of button presses needed for manual play. When triggered, Auto Pop will break crystals until an enemy appears. If an enemy is visible, Auto Pop will break one crystal. For the purposes of Color Match, Auto Pop counts as one action and can be used to lock the color you want for the next enemy that spawns! You can trigger Auto Pop by pulling the .
